InstantCpanelHosting.com sells OpenVZ VPSs in USA (Dallas), the Luxemburg or Netherlands possible.

This offer is valid on all VPSs 128MB RAM up to 16GB RAM VPS and even on shared hosting plans.

During order, select Monthly billing term and apply coupon code "70OFFFIRSTMONTH"

https://instantcpanelhosting.com/cart.php?gid=4 (VPSs)

VPS upgrades/downgrades should be instant. Setup is automatic when paid PerfectMoney or Bitcoin.

https://instantcpanelhosting.com (Homepage)

Hope that help
